error.signature: called `Result::unwrap()` on an `Err` value: Arc::try_unwrap failed because there are still other strong references

verdict.summary: Arc::try_unwrap fails when other Arc clones still exist. You must ensure all other references are dropped first.

dead_ends.action: Use unsafe to extract the inner value regardless of reference count
dead_ends.why_fails: Other references will point to freed memory causing use-after-free bugs

workarounds.action: Ensure all other Arc clones are dropped before calling try_unwrap
Use Arc::into_inner() (Rust 1.70+) which returns None instead of panicking

leads_to.condition: When Arc ownership issues affect channel endpoints

preceded_by.condition: When Arc is introduced to satisfy Send bounds

frequently_confused_with.distinction: E0382 is compile-time move error; Arc unwrap failure is a runtime error from shared ownership
